project.title: Covid-19 Streamlit Application Quick Start Guide
project.description: Download the Covid-19 application from GitHub using Git and use VS Code to run it.
project.step1: Download the Project Open your terminal or command line Navigate to the folder you want to use: $Users/me/Desktop/Streamlit Initialize git in the folder: $ git init Clone the GitHub repo: $ git clone https://github.com/caly-pso/covid_app.git
project.step2: Create a Virtual Environment Move into hte project's root folder: $ cd covid_app Create a virtual environment: $ python -m venv .venv Activate the environment: source .venv/bin/activate Clone the GitHub repo: $ git clone https://github.com/caly-pso/covid_app.git/task4>
project.step3: Run the Application Install the requirments: $ pip install -r requirements.txt Run the application locally: $ streamlit run covid_app.py
